Title: UCASE()
Description: UCASE() 函数将字符串转换为大写字母，此函数等价于 UPPER() 函数。
注意当字符串为 null 时，则返回 NULL。
Examples: SELECT UCASE('bigdata') AS result_upper, UCASE(null) AS result_null;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT UCASE('bigdata') AS result_upper, UCASE(null) AS result_null;
EffectiveSQLs: SELECT UCASE('bigdata') AS result_upper, UCASE(null) AS result_null;
